content.detailedDescription: I was out for my morning walk in my neighborhood.  it was 5:15 a.M. and the sky was completely clear.  i go for a walk every morning so i am pretty familiar with the stars and such at that time of day.  i have observed numerous shooting stars and passenger jets which is what made this sighting very different.  i always try to look upwards as much as possible as i enjoy seeing orion, very prominent this time of year, and watching the progression of venus and the moon in the east.  i observed two star-like objects travelling from the southwest towards the northeast.  one was behind and slightly to the side of the other. both were of the same brightness, which was steady and non-twinkling.  neither had flashing lights common to passenger jets and there was no sound.  i have seen numerous jets at that time of morning and can tell one immediately by the flashing lights as well as the fact that they always are travelling from east to west or west to east, never in the direction i saw these objects travelling.  the objects maintained a straight line and consistent speed.  when they appeared about due east from me, and about a 30 degree angle from the horizon, the one behind suddenly brightened, almost as bright as venus. it then dimmed til it was dimmer than the one in front, and dimmer than it was before it brightened.  both maintained the same speed and direction, and distance and orientation from each other, until they disappeared in the northeast.  i live very close to our local airport, which has an air national guard unit stationed there.  these were definitely not jets from the unit--there was no sound or the flashing lights associated with the jets.  believe me, as close as i am to the airport, i am very aware when they take-off and land.  i also do not believe they were passenger jets due to the direction they were travelling as well as the absence of the flashing lights i always notice on them.  the fact that one was behind and offset from the other was also curious, as well as the sudden brightening and then dimming of the one behind.  they did not twinkle like a star as they moved through the sky nor did they deviate at all from their course.  they were certainly not shooting stars--i have seen numerous of those and they last only a couple of seconds.  these objects took about two minutes to disappear in the northeast.  i am not sure what they were but i am very certain as to what they were not.  they did not appear to be as high in altitude as a passenger jet, in fact they appeared quite low.  so low that they appeared in size only slightly smaller than venus.  i have to admit that this is one of the most fascinating and interesting things i have seen during my walks.  i will certainly be paying more attention upwards.
content.summary: Observed 2 star-like objects, one behind and to the left of the other, moving from southwest to northeast, one brightened and then dimmed, no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a movie in my living room at about 11pm on monday, nov. 5th when i noticed it had started to rain outside. we are in the middle of a drought and i had not heard it was going to rain so i went to the front door to look outside and see how hard it was coming down.  as i approached the door i heard a strange noise that sounded like a low wooshing almost like a high pressure fire hose off in the distance. i opened the door and looked outside into the sky, immediately noticing a large dark triangle shape above out courtyard. the object was approximately 600 feet off the ground, passing over our courtyard and looked as large as a commercial airliner. it was an equilateral triangle with bright white lights (not blinking) at each corner, one fainter white light (also not blinking) just in back of the forward light and a bright red blinking light in the center of the craft.  i watched in awe as it cruised slowly west across highway 395 and out of sight.  i live less than 4 miles from the pentagon and we have military helicopters flying over our house several times a day, but i have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Black triangle passed near house and headed west

content.detailedDescription:
I was talking on the phone to a friend who lives out of town, smoking a cigarette and looking in the sky at orion and pleiades (my favorite star cluster) then i saw this... movement, at first i thought it was a satellite then i noticed there was 7 reddish orange circular objects all moving at the same speed in what looked like a flight pattern. it appeared as if it was one half of a v formation heading east to west. at that time i told my friend that i was seeing something very strange in the sky. i told him i would call him back and got off the phone. the hairs on the back of my neck stood up. the objects looked to be perfectly spaced between them and started to turn southwest and continued heading that direction staying in the same pattern. i ran inside to get my camera (took about 20 sec.) shut off the porch light and by the time i took out the camera it was gone. i stayed outside for about a half hour looking at the sky but it never came back and i never saw anything else out of the ordinary.


looked like this...

                   o
                o
             o
          o
       o
    o
 o
content.summary: Uniform westerly flight pattern

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: At apprx. 4:15pm pdt, sunday 6-24-07 my husband called me to come outside.  he sounded like it was urgent.  when i went outside he pointed up & asked me what i thought that was, that it was there for a while and was traveling parallel to the street (from south to north)i ran in and got my binoculars & it looked to be a large cylinder.  at first i thought it might be a balloon, but it was too large and it didn't move like a balloon.  it stayed horizontal for a long time, then it made a turn (east to west) parallel to our front street.  when it started traveling i ran in to get my video camera but it was out of battery.  i remembered i had my digital camera in my purse & brought it outside to get a video.  when i came back outside it started to change direction from being hrizonal to vertical.  in the horizontal mode it looked to be very shiny, like tin foil, on the top where the sun hit it, but the rest of it seemed very black.  i had trouble capturing it on photo or video (my camera had dust & stuff on it from being in my purse).  when this thing started it was a nice blue sky day and then it started getting cloudy and then it got really dark skies with lightening (we rarely have lightening here).  it climbed up and finally disappeared into the clouds.  since we are on the canadian border here, i called the border patrol and told them what we had seen (even my neighbor's daughter saw it).  i told them i was not a nut job or crazy.  they said i should call 911.  i told them the reason i called border patrol was because it was flying towards white rock, surrey, bc.  i asked if they would just go out and look up to see if they could see it.  i know that laughed their butts off when they got off the phone and thought i was crazy.  my husband & i got in the car and tried to keep up with it, but we lost it in the dark clouds.  about an hour later, my husband went to fill up the car at a gas station and he heard on the radio a lady asking if anyone else saw something flying over canada.  since we are on the border, we get the canadian stations better.  anyway, i was going to call the radio station, but my husband said not to and just let it go because he didn't want people thinking we are crazy.  ever since then i have been wondering what it was.  if it is a balloon i'll be so happy that i am not a nut.  but, this really didn't look like a balloon, it was very large, silent and moved in a rational direction.  balloons usually just float around. hope someone can help settle my mind. (i took about 5 pictures & 2 mpgs, but my camera is old.)
content.summary: Cylinder shape large shiny when hit by sun dark the rest

content.detailedDescription:
At about 10:00 or 10:05 pm on nov 5th i was outside waiting for my dogs to finish their business. i always gaze up at the night sky. i observed in the north sky a boomerang or triangle shape with many lights..
as the object came closer above my house the lights began to breakup out of formation, kinda of dancing. i thought i must be going crazy.
i watched it disappear into the south sky.
i just stood there... about 2-5 mins lapsed, and i turned around to the east sky and looked up and it had circled around again.  same thing was happening... the lights broke out of formation then back into the shape of a boomerang or triangle. this time it dispeared into the west sky. i watched for many more minutes thinking i might see it again...Nothing,
i know what i saw was really there. i wonder if anyone else saw it in colorado springs?
content.summary: boomerang  or v shaped object with many lights

content.detailedDescription:
We were having storms, power went out about 9pm, came back on around 4am.  got up to do rounds and saw what at first appeard to be a ship with a bright light out on the ocean to the west.  then figured it was just a bright star, so went back to bed.  
then realized that it was an extreemely cloudy night, with no stars visable.  if this was a star, it had to be beneath the clouds.  got back up to watch the object.  
marked my position with a post and wathed the object go up and down about 15 degrees and side to side about 30 degrees.  i am an ex-marine with the fighter wing, so i know aircraft and sar planes.  this was not a conventional aircraft.  it was so captivating that i spent the rest of the night in the back yard watching this thing.  
watched this thing until it got fairly light.  it finally went into a dark thunder cloud due south.

called and talked with a couple of friends in the mainland to keep from freaking out while watching this thing.  

trying to come to terms with this event.  it is the first time i have ever seen anything like this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Watched object move for two hours in side to side and up and down manner

content.detailedDescription:
My son is 14 years old and observed a strange object in the sky while riding the bus to school. at approximately 06:55, my son's bus was on beck road at the joy road intersection, in canton, michigan. he looked out the bus window to the west and he saw 3 dim white lights at about 40 degrees above the horizon. the lights then started to brighten and became very bright white. the object then began to move slowly upward and to the north. it went a short distance then stopped, changed direction, going upward and to the south for a short distance. the object stopped again, then began moving slowly north and upward. it stopped again, then flew south and upward again for the last time. it stopped, tipped vertically revealing a distinct saucer-shaped craft with 3 bright white lights in a triangular formation. remaining in that sideway's position, it slowly ascended, then instantly disappeared. my son was too shocked to think to point it out to anyone else on the bus. he said no one else took notice that he was aware of. 

that evening, i told my wife that our son saw what he thought was a ufo while riding to school and i didn't describe anything to her about what our son said to me. she immediately said that she saw something very strange that morning also, while driving to work. she said, whatever it was, it had 3 impossibly bright white lights and was hovering in the field north of the road, just above the trees, as she drove past it on ford road, going west, near the ridge road intersection. she said it was huge. she said it was about the size of a small ranch home. she said she wanted to stop, but there was too much traffic and she couldn't pull over safely. she also said that it felt like she wasn't supposed to stop. she said that it almost felt like the idea was implanted in her head that she was observing some farm equipment like a large irrigation system. 

she saw this very similiar looking craft approximately 10 to 15 minutes earlier than my son at around 06:40. her location was approximately 2.5 miles away from my son's location when he saw the saucer. this was amazing since i didn't give my wife details of what our son saw and to have her tell me the same number of lights as our son along with seeing it 10 minutes apart in the same area. drawings and a map are attached.
content.summary: 2 separate sightings - saucer with 3 very bright lights observed in non ballistic flight, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was outside the east side my house listening to the cowboy/eagles sunday night game, just after halftime facing west.  i looked up over my head and saw, coming from north to south, a formation of triangles.  they were perfectly arranged and stayed in their orientation through the whole sighting.  each triangle looked like it was outlined, with the only light visible being on it's edges.  it gave me the impression that these triangles were fixed on something but i couldn't see any shape of a craft.  i put my hand up and figured the size to be that of just under the size of a quarter at arm's length.  when i first saw the triangles they were approximately 20-25 degrees north of me to my right.  i watched the formation travel to the south for about 6 seconds then i had to move to south side of my house because the formation went behind my roof line.  i saw them immediately when i got to the south side of my house and continued watching them travel south for ten seconds more.  when the formation was approximately 45 degrees from me it changed directions and headed west into mexico.  it did not turn or reorient itself.  it simply went west at about 90 degrees from it's previous flight path.  the peculiar thing was that it's flight time across the sky did not appear to change speeds as my angle to it increased it appeared to still go as fast as it did when it was straight overhead.  after it changed directions it accelerated and was gone from view in about 2 seconds.  there were no flashing or colored lights.  i couldn't see any form of the craft.  the triangular light formation did look very much like it may have been on the bottom of the craft as they did seem to visually be tilting away from me as the angle of view got greater.  the best way to describe what i saw was to think of nine florescent tubes in groups of three touching ends together to form three triangles, placing the triangles apart so that one side of a triangle lines up on the line of another at least 4 or 5 side distances apart.  the triangles formed a perfect triangle.  at no time did i see any stars between the triangles.  there was no sound coming from the craft while it was in transit or after it was gone.  we have high flying commercial airliners flying into mexico pretty much every day and i can't hear their engines till they are about 15 degrees from straight overhead.  this formation may have been outside the atmosphere.  i have never seen anything like this before.  but i'm so glad i have seen it.
content.summary: Triangular light formation

content.detailedDescription: While walking my dog this morning around the block i was heading south when i noticed what appeared to be two brite stars in the pre-dawn sky.  the sky was very clear and these lights at first appeared to be stars but they were in motion coming toward me traveling in a northern direction.  they moved in tandem as if at opposite ends of a blimp or something but at one point directly overhead i could view another star between them.  they were traveling at a constant speed and took about 2 1/2 minutes to completely disappear into the northern horizon.  i kept looking for flashing lights or red lights that would indicate a plane but did not see any.  i also listened for engine noise of any sort but heard nothing.
content.summary: Two white tandem lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was hanging out on my friends roof having a late night drink when the two of us suddenly noticed this bright light above us.   the object was round w/ a reddish and green light coming out from under it.   it made quick movements and started coming closer to us.  we both had no idea what to make of it but then quickly realized that this was something that we've both never seen before.  

we were both so scared that we ran inside my friends building and peered out from her window to see if the object was still there.   the object remained outside my friends window and were so scared that we opted to stop looking and go to sleep.   therefore i have no idea how long it was outside the window.   the whole episode lasted for about 20 minutes.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in san francisco russian hill district on november 3rd

content.detailedDescription:
I have been informed by the alian leaders to help them inform the american people and the people of the planet earth that it was time they meet with all of use to explain why there here and how long they intend to be here.

this meeting will take place in death valley, ca on july 8th 20008 around 10:00-11:00 pm.

many people know about this meeting already but this is for the record.

thanks
this is all the information i have been given up to know.

I am a retired airline pilot and coast guard licensed master (captain).  i was giving instruction in celestial navigation to a student at north 27 degrees 49 minutes lattitude, west 97 degrees 03 minutes longitude.  we were shooting venus and the moon.  sky clear, visibility 10 miles.  we had watched the iss pass about an hour and a half earlier.  
venus' altitude was 44 degrees azmith 128 degrees.  at the 10 0'clock position on venus about 5 degrees separation was a celestial body that i could not identify.  it was the approximate intensity of jupiter.  it remained stationary at the above position for the 20 minutes while we were taking our shots.  it was a steady star like body.  no flashing or colored lights or any other remarkable characteristics.
following our shots we departed to the class room, resolved and plotted same, by then it was about 9 am.  
i proceded to the star charts in order to identify the body in question and could find nothing.  no stars, no planet.  this morning it was gone.  no trace of it within 20 degrees of venus.
i have never seen swamp gas but i don't think that's what it was because it was too high.  it was not a satelite because it was too bright and never moved.  i have seen weather baloons on many occasions and this was not.  it was not an aircraft approaching with the landing light on because of lack of movement over 20 minutes and no other flashing or otherwise lights.
i have no idea what it could have possibly been hence it was an unidentified object in the sky, possibly flying.
content.summary: Star like object in the morning sky

content.detailedDescription: Me located in romaland, ca going into work. i always look in the sky early morning on my way to work tolook at stars and planets, this is how i noticed this strange occurrence. thoug it might be a comet but i wasn't aware of any that would be seen this time of year. comet like thing in sky moving in a eastern direction about 6:30 am pst and faded away after about 5 minutes or so. it had sort of a round head with a comet like tail but the tail was real short and it just didn't move like a comet but maintained a steady direction. a few minutes later there were jetstreams all around going toward the same direction like planes were looking or follwing after the object. saw two other round shiny globelike objects apear and disappear twice after the planes went by. shortly after another plane came by. i just felt like somthing strange is going on like a ufo or some sort of rocket or missile might have been fired.
content.summary: Looked like a comet but traveled differently than a comet

content.detailedDescription:
Drinking coffee and going outside my husband observed something and came in to get his binoculars and said he was seeing something strange. i walked out and saw the object.

my first thought was it must be a blimp (the speed and the altitude i suppose) but then loking through the binoculars there was nothing between the two lights - no gondala, craft or wings.  there was simply a blue space that appeared to be the sky. 

observed in clear pre-dawn sky two lights that appeared to be in the normal flight altitudes of approx. 500 feet. it was traveling sw to nw; front white light appeared similar to a 1st magnitude star and the trailing white light appearred more like a 2-3 mag. star (one witness has a background in amatuer astronomy).

i looked closely to see the normal tell-tale blinking lights required for flying craft (the red ones) and there were no other lights on this object. there was just the bright, white, unblinking lights.  we do ot know what this object was - no doubt it will prove to be something pretty normal but it was simply very strange and something neither of us had ever seen before despite years of doing amatuer astronomy.

clear sky - little wind. totally silent. no engine or noise. 10x50 binoculars revealed no connecting structure from front white light to back white light. crossed the clear sky in 3-5 minute to disappear in the dawn glow to the nw. if within flight path speed appeared close to small craft flight speed - if astronomical it was traveling fast. the only lights showing were clear, bright white with no other regulation lighting seen.
content.summary: Observed two white tandem lights in pre-dawn se-nw sky

content.detailedDescription:
It was late summer in the lower sierra mountains.  i got home after work and the electricity was off.  this wasn't unusual in the mountains.  it was warm, but overcast; as  though there was going to be a thunder storm.  my house was dark inside, so i decided to read outside on the porch until the electricity came back on.  i'd been reading about 10 minutes when i saw a flash of light in my peripheral vision and figured it was lightening.  i stopped reading to watch the sky for more lightening.  i saw another flash of light, but it was not lightening.  i watched and discovered the light was not only flashing on and off, but was moving to the left.  i followed the light and i saw it go into a ship.  i was awe struck.  i saw more flashing lights go into the ship and tried to decide if i should go get my camera or binoculars.  i didn't want to miss anything, so i decided to stay and watch.  i remember wishing my roommate was home to see it too.  the ship, at that time, was stationary.  no sound, just hanging in the air.  it resembled a raspberry lighted from he inside.  it was the size of the end of my thumb, making it hard to tell its size or distance.  when the last of the flashing lights had entered the ship, it began to move south.  i watched it until it disappeared behind the hill behind my house.  not too long after, the electricity came back on.  i called the local tv station, but no one had reported anything unusual and i was told a transformer had been the electrical problem.  i saw your ad on the tv and decided to finally report this.  i currently live in southern oregon and in nov. of 2004, there was a lot of air craft in the area as pres. bush was staying overnight here.  i was outside after dark and saw a bright light come on from the south.  i waited for it to get bigger as it came closer, but it appeared to be stationary.  after a while, it went off and then two bright lights came on.  they were much bigger than any other aircraft and there was no sound.  they went off and when they came back on, there were three bright lights.  they appeared to be in a straight line.  they blinked off and when they came back on, they were in the shape of a triangle.  they blinked off again and when they came back they were in the shape of a smile.  i started for my neighbor's house as i wanted someone else to see this too.  unfortunately, they blinked off again and didn't come back on.  on new year's eve, eve, (dec. 30th) 2005, i noticed lights dancing in the clouds.  it was after dark and i thought it must be one of those huge lights they use at movie premiers shining up at the clouds.  a few minutes after i had gone inside, my neighbor came over and asked me to look at some lights in the sky.  i told her i had noticed them, but figured they were man made.  she said, the light was not coming from the ground and after looking more closely, i could see she was right.  the lights were either on the other side of the clouds pointing down, or within the clouds themselves.  there were three or four of them and they "danced" around and around.  we talked about them for a long time afterwards.  i have seen other remarkable things in the sky and even have a couple of pictures, but these incidents were definately ufo's.  i've had friends and relatives tell of their ufo sightings, but i was never totaly convinced until i saw the red, oval, ufo in the sky over eastern madera county, california. 
vickie j. pippett
content.summary: Red oval ship - white lights going into ship - ship slowly moving away....

content.detailedDescription:
I made a report on another web site on the day of the event. i came across a report that tx made for the same day to see that he posted somthing major that i forget to type. the crafts moved in a straight line horizontal to the earth but in a diagonal formation. 

4/29/2006 19:30 and still the sun is out and bright. while in my backyard sneaking a smoke i saw what looked like 3 seagulls coasting in the wind. i bacame concerd when the "birds" got closer without ever flapping a wing. at this point i threw my cig down and call my brother on his cell, he lives on the upper level of our house and has 20/20 vision ( i wear glasses and the prescription is not all that great) by the time he makes it to the window, the craft were as close as planes coming in for a landing. i didnt need glasses to see that my brother said wtf is that. it is now passing directly over our house. i run inside to the 3rd floor on the opposite side of our house to see the 1st 2 crossed over and the 3rd one 3 seconds later. 

tech stuff... the objects came in from the horizon at 260 deg sw flew at the closest point over my house i ran from the back yard to the front ( 60' ) just to see it come out from over my house and head ne at 80 deg toward long island.

i'm attaching a picture keep in mind the were in a group of 3
content.summary: 3 cigar crafts should be cross ref with tx event

content.detailedDescription: No se que es por eso quisiera una respuesta tengo algunas mas que tome pero solo sale en una foto,tome 5 fotos en 1 minuto y sale en una en los pantanos de villa el salvador lima peru jdonaldorojas@hotmail.Com,el o la cosa esta en meio de la foto contactense conmigo y les mando las otras.
content.summary: No se que es por eso mando la foto

content.detailedDescription:
High, strangely moving cirrus clouds that seemed to have appeared out of nowhere turned our direction skyward.We witnessed two flat, noiseless objects within five minutes of each other. they appeared to have a skeletal, wishbone like frame and moved across the sky like a glider might move. we could not make out any defined body but there did seem to be some kind of dark area within the frame. the back end or tail had no real definition it seemed to almost fade into the sky. the crafts were in sight for approximately ten seconds each, before we lost sight of them. these two crafts came out of what appeared to be high altitude cirrus clouds, moving in a east-southeasterly direction. the clouds were long, thin and transparent, localized to a specific area in the sky. the clouds themselves seemed to last no more then two hours in duration. i noticed the clouds at eleven pm central time and they had completely vanished out of sight by about one fifteen am.   
the crafts seemed to emerge directly out of the cloud bank and both crafts heading in a southeasterly fashion. the overall feeling of the event was very negative.
content.summary: Two wishbone shaped objects glided silently out of high alititude cirrus clouds over southwest omaha nebraska

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i noticed what looked like a ufo and my daughter who is 2&1/2 said that she wanted to touch it , then it disappeared. it was only for a few seconds but it definatley did not look like an airplane.
content.summary: My daughter and i noticed what looked like a ufo and my daughter who is 2&1/2 said that she wanted to touch it , then it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Four people were traveling in a car eastward on kansas highway 50 toward dodge city.  about 4 miles east of cimarron, ks, at 9:40 a.M. on saturday, november 3, 2007, an aircraft was sighted flying at low altitude over the fields north of the highway.  it appeared to be flying approximately 500 to 1000 feet above the ground.  the aircraft, from a distance, appeared to be low flying crop-dusting aircraft making a wide counter-clockwise arc around the field less than half a mile from the highway.  two people witnessed this object:  the driver and front passenger.

as we drove further along, we noticed that the craft was shiny silver in color with some areas of red along the side and rear of the plane.  however, when we were nearest to it, we realized it had no wings.  it had a crumpled appearance, as if the outside shell of the craft had large dented areas.  it also had a single rear fin.  it left no vapor trail and was completely silent.  the front passenger of the car watched the object continuously and exclaimed that it had suddenly disappeared. the driver was looking at the road briefly while driving then looked back out the left window and saw that the aircraft was gone.  it had not landed or flown out of view.  it had simply disappeared.  the two witnesses scanned the entire clear blue sky, and the aircraft could not be located.

both witnesses are familiar with various kinds of low-flying aircraft that are normally visible in the area, such as crop-dusting propeller planes and ultralight aircraft.  this aircraft was neither of those.  it was not a conventional aircraft.
content.summary: Wingless aircraft disappears while flying at low altitude over kansas fields

content.detailedDescription:
I had just graduated from university of idaho in 1978 with degrees in chemical engineering and chemistry and was employed by bunker hill mining company's quality control laboratory.   i was married and my wife was completing a mining engineering degree.   at the time, we were renting a house from my parents along the northeast shore of coeur d' alene lake which was on a hill several hundred yards in elevation above the lake, overlooking the lake and to the north of interstate highway 90.

my wife, lisa, and i had just had dinner and walked out onto the second floor deck overlooking the lake and pine forested hillsides.  i was past sunset but still very light.  as we were looking out over the lake together, a glow appeared under the water, and a glowing greenish-white oval object rose from out of the water, water running off of it.   the object slowly rose vertically until it was slightly above the level of the house.  then it stopped for a few seconds, and then what i saw literally looked like a tapering white line of light going to the northwest going level  and whatever it was went from it's stationary point to being gone over the horizon  so fast that i am sure it was far less than a second and the fact that to my vision it appeared as a solid straight white tapering line. 

from my technical studies and having taken biology, knowing the human eye responds to images down to roughly 1/24 of a second, i can only speculate that because it looked like a straight line of white light and i did not distinctly see and individual object, that it was moving that distance in less than the time it takes my eyes to process it.  i have never seen anything like this before or since. whatever it was, it went from standing still to a streak of light instantaneously.

one of us said, "did you see that?" and the other nodded their head. it's almost 30 years ago, so that i don't even remember, just the nature of the interaction.   i was so stunned that i never breathed a word of this to anyone for three years. i felt like i was literally in a state of shock and despite reading ufo books since the early 1960s, my mind was still completely unprepared for this event. all i can say was that because it came from under a lake, rose vertically, stopped and shot off like a beam of light, it had the appearance of being intelligently controlled unless mother nature has such phenomenon that don't make sense.  i think i didn't talk about it, because my brain had absolutely no reference point for it in my day to day reality.  seeing something like this is far more profound mentally and emotionally than reading all the books in the world on ufos because even with all the books, it leaves room for doubt.  this personal experience left no explanation, but it also left no room for doubt either.   i do not speculate on what it was and neither can i shrug it off.  we lost sight of the object as is disappear over the horizon in a streak of light and guessing from our elevation visibility from up there in the hills of northern idaho is probably 100 mile and whatever it was made up that distance in a flash.

steve
content.summary: Glowing greenish-white oval probably 20-40 feet long (a rough guess)

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting on our deck watching the sky for shooting stars, it was a very clear night.  my wife noticed it first, a triangle, dark in the middle with lights on each point.  it appeared out of nowhere and traveled across the sky and over our house at a very high rate of speed.  she brought it to my attention and i saw it as well.  it was completely silent.  the object took about 5 or so seconds to cross the sky and went over the house where we lost site of it.  it traveled in a east/south east direction towards the town of brighton.  the object appeared to be solid because as it traveled it blotted out stars behind it.  hard to tell how big or how high it was due to not having a frame of reference.  my guess is that it was about 1,500 to 2,000 feet up.  as for size, i'd guess bigger than an airliner.  all three lights were white and equidistant to each other.  it flew in a straight pattern.  i called this sighting into the local sheriff's department.
content.summary: Triangle traveled over our house

content.detailedDescription:
Walked out side looked up at a clear sky.  lightred object not moving. then started to move upword. then moved over me at about 1400 ft.  blinked like plane but silent.  this was at 17 mile and utica rd.

please e-mail me if someone else seen this.

this was very very strange!!!!!!
content.summary: Silent and low enough to hear if it was conventional

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out onto the front patio of my house, which faces directly se, to enjoy my daily ritual of the morning coolness with my coffee and cigarette. the sky was quite clear, no clouds or fog, tempurature about 45 degrees centigrade, with a very light breeze from the south. the milky way was clearly visible. 
i was looking up towards the east at venus, which is quite bright this time of year, when i noticed a very bright object appear from behind and just above the treeline across the street from my home. when it first appeared, it's angle was about 30 degrees above the horizon and due se. 
the object was unusually bright; i estimate it to be about twice the brightness of the planet venus at the time. when i first saw it, it was about 20 degrees to the right of venus. it was moving slowly (roughly 2-3 degrees of arc per second) and i initially thought that it was an airplane. there was no sound. i observed this object for another 10-15 seconds as it moved higher above the horizon, moving nw and eventually above my head. i began to notice that the object was not only getting much brighter, but it had no visible clearance lights of any kind. i also noticed that it began to have a visible shape to it.
it was irregular in appearance, roughly diamond-shaped, but it was still way too small to make out any details.
i then thought that maybe i was looking at a satellite or maybe the international space station, but i also realised that such objects don't move from east to west. this got my curiosity up.
i ran inside my house to grab my binoculars, a vivatar 7x50 (297ft @ 100yrds). at this moment, the object was directly overhead. knowing this, i ran to the back of my house to the back porch that faced nw.
at this point, the object had just become visible overhead. i quickly adjusted the focus on my binoculars. what i saw through the eyepieces was a solid potato-shaped object, slightly irregular in appearance, appoximately the size of a grain of rice held at arm's length. no details could be seen. no lights of any kind. no visible contrail, glow, or halo. it did not appear to rotate or have any other kind of movement along any axis. it was bright white in color.
after observing this object for about another 10 seconds, i noticed that the object began to quickly change color from bright white to grey and then to a ruddy red. at this moment, the object was approximately 50-55 degrees above the horizon, directly nw.
i deduced that the object was possibly passing through the penumbra and into the shadow of the earth.
it then suddenly went dark at about a 45 degree angle above the horizon. i checked my watch and the time was 5:41am cdt.

personal backround: i'm a us army-trained observer, familiar with almost all both civilian and military aircraft configurations and nighttime lighting. i have good knowledge of established civilian air traffic patterns in my area. i am also an amateur astronomer who owns an 6 inch newtonian telescope which i use for personal enjoyment. i have way above-average knowledge of astronomy.

based upon my personal observations of the object in question, along with it's angle and direction of travel, brightness in magnitude and variations in said magnitude as it passed overhead, and other characteristics, i have ruled-out any civilian or military aircraft, or possibly most any low-earth orbit satellites. 
the object could possibly have been a stratospheric-level weather balloon, but the wind directions on the ground and higher elevations at the time rules this out (i checked the noaa reports before i posted this).

i believe that i may have observed the passing of a earth-crossing object.
content.summary: Irregularly-shaped object, x2 times the brightness of venus, moving slowly from se to ne

content.detailedDescription: Read article in courier journal,by bryon crawford, 10,7,07
content.summary: See courier journal, bryon crawford- article, 10 31 07

content.detailedDescription: I was a marine in iraq on a post tower at about 1am iraq time.  two other marines were in the tower with me and we were watching the stars and talking.  in iraq in the middle of the night u can see everything, it seems like u can see every star.  there isnt many planes that fly at all.   you see are planes and when they get lower there lights go out.   plus u can here them from very far away.   we were talking when one of my marine buddies said whats that and pointed to the sky in shock.   i missed it, but he said he saw a object brake apart in the sky and that when i began to watch.   the now two objects were flying as if they were folowing each other.   nothing much from wat i saw at first untill they would move vertical together in the sky at the sametime, stop in one spot, and then turn to a horazontal path.   this would happen many times.  then they would sort of disappear and we would look fro them in the sky and one would appear.   maybe two sec later the other would appear and be away from it and catch up and be right behind it again.   they would sometimes fly apart fast and then meetup when they turn back and when they get close enough stop and then move again together.  now sometimes they would go apart from each other and start to do their own thing.   once  one of the obejects shot up and then  made a half circle like turn and then shoot down at amazing speeds.   now we did see at least one plain go by because it seemed as if the objects were goin to fly at it. this really showed how fast they could move.   these objects were as bright as the brightest star in the sky.  they had a light blue look to them.   once when they were apart  one of the objects was flying around when the other one shot into it and they made a bigger obeject.  i would say 3 times the size of the biggest brightest star in the sky.   they had like a almost flash when they came togther to be one in the sky.  not some flash in the enire sky, sort of just around  them.   later after a 15-30 sec time the object broke apart to be two again.   that along with this was the most amazing part of the night.  at one point when they disapeared and we were looking for the obejects we saw one apear in the main area we had been looking at that night, (that area was about 45 degrees up away from us, like you were looking at stars from your roof that were away from your house not just about you) when we were looking fro the other object i saw it at the corner of my eye.  i then had to turn my body to see the obeject.   after about a few seconds it shot across the sky all the way to the main area we had been looking at in about one second.  i watched it move across the sky and i had to turn my body back to the orginal spot to see that it had now stoped next to the other obeject and they begain flying together again.  this all went on for about 45min.   after about 25-30 min, my ssgt, my sgt and two or three other marines showed up.  when we began to tell them what we were watched my ssgt started making jokes and thinking we were being stupid and just watching plains or jets.   when he came up to the tower his jokes and laughs at us stopped almost the second he saw what we saw.  this man never shut up so for something to leave him speachless, had to have blown his mind.    he then in a serious voice asked if any of us had a camera (most the time we always had one, and he said ,"yall always wanna record yourself doin dumbshit, but then something like this is in the sky and no one has one!")  we had some marines in the humvee on post below us and im sure they saw some of this along with one of the marines that was in the humvee that my ssgt showed up in.   the speeds and the moves that we saw that night are inpossible.   the three of us in the tower, the sgt,ssgt, and two other marines that showed up, and also the marines on the ground all saw this.   we are trained military personal.   some who have been on airbase and seen what jets can do and no jet can do what we saw.  no jet can stop and freeze in the middle of the sky or go across the sky at the speeds we saw, plus when they came together.    this all is easier to explain in person then just words.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Objects moving across sky this size of largest star out, sometimes coming together to make larger object

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 9 pm eastern time canada. i was outside with my room mate taking a smoke. it was chilly outside, around 2 degrees celcius. so i wanted this smoking time to be as bref as possible. my room mate and i started talking about a subject regarding the univers and all its mysteries. the conversation lasted about 15 minutes. 
       i was just about to finish my cigarette when i looked up at the sky and saw two redish orbs fly about less than 3000 feet across the sky perpendicular to us. at first i thought it was a falling star. but i noticed that it did not leave that typical trail of light. i am a pilot and i know about all flying vehicles. they all standardly hold a starbord green light and a port red light, strobe lights, and rotating beacon. and at that altitude and thats speed, it would have made an incredible noise. but thoses objects where flying at about 1000 km and made absoluteley no sound. 
       what i noticed really odd is that they where criss crossing and rotating around each other. like if playing with each other. this part is the hardest to describe but i hope the reader understand what i mean by this. the flight patern and the way they where flying was not rectilinear. the flight paterns of those ufos where constatly moving either in front, back, rotating around each other. they acted as two birds who fell in love. the most impressive part is that they did not make any sound. there where no clouds around. so it could not be a form of projector or light at any kind.
       i grabed my room mate by the arm as strong as i could, started to yell at him, told him to look up because there was an incredible event happening. he did not see anything. my adrenaline whent up because i knew what i had witnessed. at that instant i wanted to call the authorities and the news broadcasting company to tell them what i had seen. i ended up not doing that.
those objects disapeared behind the houses.
content.summary: Double red light orbs silent rapid flight

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home that evening; and as we turned to enter our neighborhood, i spotted lights in the sky.  when i looked through the windshield and then out my side window (by this time it was almost directly overhead, flying toward us), i clearly saw a fairly large, elongated triangle shape that was darker than the sky.  there were multiple green lights running lengthwise down the center.  the shape was very distinct--no protrusions anywhere, just straight edges.  because of the terrain and trees which obscured my view as we turned, i could only get one more brief glimpse--this time from the rear.  all the lights appeared yellow from that angle.  i was unable to see a side or top view at any point, only the underside.  my husband did not see it (though he was certainly aware that i did!), and we did not stop the car or cut off the engine; however, in retrospect, neither of us remember hearing any sound. i know it was not an ordinary airplane; and it seemed too low for a flight approaching the greenville-spartanburg airport.  it all happened very quickly, and i very much regret not insisting that we turn around and try to catch sight of it again.
content.summary: Elongated triangle aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
Large bright object thought was airplane as live in nw indiana but saw the object stop drop zigazg go forward stop drop and stayed stopped seemed for 5 minutes could have been less also was startled.


the house i'm in has a window as you come down from the top floor you can see north  and east out of the window, well i was bringing down a load of laundry and to my eyesight i saw a large very bright light coming from the east moving west thought it was a large plane until i noticed its movement forward  then stopped then like disappeared but dropped down then zigzagged then stopped i kept checking my eyesight to see if i was just seeing things but no it kept doing these movements, then what startled me(scared the hell out of me) another object like a v shaped boomerang ? like that stealth plane shape kind of, but it was silent glowing red and headed fast at that other object i jumped to the floor  dropping the basket and hesitated to get up and look out the window because this thing was so close and low, my heart was pounding in my mouth as this was totally out of nowhere when i got up freaked out i looked out the window and neither that glowing nor the very bright object were any where to be seen, the last eye view of this sight was to the north? i was shaken for the next 40 minutes or so thinkinig did i just see that or am i going crazy? i did think about it the followuing week also . it is clear in my mind to this day!  what got me was that red glowing flying object! that scared the hell out of me ( because it was much lower in the sky) i saw the red glow!!!!!!

has anyone reported a red glowing object??????
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Large very bright object and other ?

content.detailedDescription: My husband & i were in our backyard when we sited what appeared at first to be perhaps satellies to us- flying in close proximity to each other and moving from west to east. as they approached a small hill nearby they seperated from each other and we could see their silver color and their appeard elongated. the one continued east- the other veering off to the northeast. my husband took 2 steps toward me as we were talking about what we had seen when he noticed the object just above our heads out of the corner of his eye & pointed up asking me "do you see that?" there was a fully charged looking object moving slowly just above the tree tops in our yard & directly over our heads. it was oblong in shape the brightest orange and red and shooting what appeard to be sparks from it. big hunks of what appeared to be debris were falling to the ground.  it had to of come directly over our house as it was travelling from south to north. we stood in amazement watching it glide to the north at the same altitude and out of sight. none of these objects made any noise & the silver did not appear to have any other lights on them. it was a clear night with no cloudcover.
content.summary: 2 long silver & one glowing red & orange object seen in our backyard one evening
